org.apache.archiva.repository.features

Class StagingRepositoryFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.features.StagingRepositoryFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryFeature<StagingRepositoryFeature>

    public class StagingRepositoryFeature
extends Object
implements RepositoryFeature<StagingRepositoryFeature>
    This feature provides some information about staging repositories.
